short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize Property Listings for Greater Effectiveness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Host Lens is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help property owners and managers enhance their listings on Booking.com. With smart insights and actionable tips, Host Lens evaluates your property’s online presence and provides personalized recommendations to improve visibility, booking rates, and overall performance.

Key Features:

- Property Scan: Analyze your listing with a single click and get a comprehensive evaluation based on key criteria such as property name, images, descriptions, and more.

- Actionable Tips: Receive detailed suggestions on how to optimize your listing for better visibility and higher bookings.

- Additional Tips: Get bonus recommendations that can help further enhance your listing’s appeal and professionalism.

- Trial Access Plan: Try the extension with full feature access for 3 scans before upgrading.

- Pro Access Plan: Unlock unlimited scans and exclusive features with the Pro version for enhanced property insights.

Maximize your property’s potential on Booking.com with Host Lens and gain the competitive edge to stand out in the marketplace.
